metadata.Title: CVE-2021-22939 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - low
metadata.Description:
If the Node.js https API was used incorrectly and "undefined" was in passedfor the "rejectUnauthorized" parameter, no error was returned andconnections to servers with an expired certificate would have beenaccepted.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-22939` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libnode108 - 18.7.0+dfsg-5ubuntu1
nodejs - 18.7.0+dfsg-5ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: nodejs package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '18.7.0+dfsg-5ubuntu1').
